findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner by setting the _maxTxAmount to a minimum value.

findings.title: OCTD - Owner Contract Tokens Drain
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to burn tokens from a specific address. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the burn function. As a result the targeted contract address will lose the corresponding tokens.

findings.title: ULTW - Unlimited Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds without limit to the team wallet, which can be abused by calling the rescueFunds method with _token argument equal to zero address.

findings.title: MT - Mint Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to mint up to 250.000.000 tokens, which can lead to highly inflated contract tokens.

findings.title: BT - Burn Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to burn tokens from a specific address, which may result in the targeted contract address losing corresponding tokens.

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions by calling the blacklistAddress function.

findings.title: TSD - Total Supply Diversion
findings.description: The amount added to total supply does not equal the amount added to balances, resulting in a diverse sum of balances from total supply.

findings.title: STC - Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: According to the ERC20 specification, the transfer methods should be checked if the result is successful. Otherwise, the contract may wrongly assume that the transfer has been established.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: There are variables that are defined in the local scope and are not initialized.
